pdhp137:2: sā prāplavate hurāhuraṁ phalameṣī va vanamhi vānnaro ।।
pdhp138:1: yaṁ cesā sahate jaṁmī tahnā loke duraccayā ।
pdhp138:2: śokā tassa pravaddhaṁti ovaṭṭhā beruṇā iva ।।
pdhp139:1: yo cetāṁ sahate jaṁmiṁ tahnāṁ loke duraccayāṁ ।
pdhp139:2: śokā tassa vivaṭṭanti udabindū va pukkhare ।।
pdhp140:1: taṁ vo vademi bhadraṁ vo yāvaṁt-ittha samāgatā ।
pdhp140:2: tahnāṁ samūlāṁ khaṇatha uṣīrātthī va beruṇiṁ ।
pdhp140:3: tahnāya khatamūlāya nāsti śokā kato bhayaṁ ।।
pdhp142:1: etam ādīnavaṁ nyāttā tahnā dukkhassa saṁbhavaṁ ।
pdhp143:1: na taṁ dṛḍhaṁ bandhanam āhu dhīrā yad āyasaṁ dārujaṁ babbajaṁ vā ।
pdhp143:2: sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu putresu dāresu ca yā apekhā ।।
pdhp144:1: etaṁ dṛḍhaṁ bandhanam āhu dhīrā ohārimaṁ sukhumaṁ dupramuñcaṁ ।
pdhp144:2: etappi chettāna vrajanti santo anapekhino sabbadukhaṁ prahāya ।।
pdhp145:2: appāssādā dukhā kāmā iti viṁñāya paṇḍito ।।
pdhp146:1: api divvesu kāmesu ratiṁ so nādhigacchati ।।
pdhp147:3: sa ve antimaśārīro mahāpraṁño ti vuccati ।।
pdhp148:1: saritāni sinehitāni ca somanassāni bhavanti jantuno ।
pdhp148:2: ye sātasitā sukheṣiṇo te ve jātijaropagā ।।
pdhp149:1: tahnāya purekkhaṭā prajā parisappanti śaśo va bādhito ।
pdhp149:2: te saṁjotanasaṅgasattā gabbham upenti punappuno ciraṁ pi ।।
pdhp150:1: muñca pure muñca pacchato majjhe muñca bhavassa pāragū ।
pdhp150:2: sabbattha vimuttamānaso na puno jātijarām upehisi ।।
pdhp151:1: yo nivvanadho vanā tu mutto vanamutto vanam eva dhāvati ।
pdhp151:2: taṁ puggalam etha paśśatha mutto bandhanam eva dhāvati ।।
pdhp152:2: tassā hi vītarāgesu dinnaṁ hoti mahapphalaṁ ।।
pdhp153:2: tassā hi vītadoṣesu dinnaṁ hoti mahapphalaṁ ।।
pdhp154:2: tassā hi vītamohesu dinnaṁ hoti mahapphalaṁ ।।
pdhp155:1: ramaṇīyaṁ vatā ’raṇṇaṁ yamhiṁ na ramate jano ।
pdhp156:1: yathā pi mūle anupadrute dṛḍhe chinno pi rukkho punar-īva jāyati ।
pdhp156:2: em eva tahnānuśaye anūhate nivvattate dukkham idaṁ punappuno ।।
